title: The Strip Poker Club
description: Edward Chambers has always been shy around girls. When his friend Matt invites him to a strip poker game, his world is suddenly changed. Can he pluck up the courage to ask out the girl of his dreams before all of their friends see her (or him) naked?  This is a short (c.12,000 word) story of risk, romance and raunchiness. I hope you enjoy reading it.
author: Cheri Grade
